backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing an e-commerce backend with authorization and blob storage mixins, managing products, orders, carts, and user profiles with role-based access control for admin and user operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four UI redesign features: new visual theme implementation, product catalog layout updates, admin dashboard redesign, and checkout/order confirmation page updates, all with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing a modern vibrant blue-cyan themed e-commerce UI with Space Grotesk typography, gradient effects, enhanced cards, and improved visual hierarchy across all pages and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with neutral grayscale palette, plus global styles for borders and background/foreground colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Business Store', and root div mounting the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for product catalog, checkout, order confirmation, and admin pages (products/orders), wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin status, displaying loading states, login prompts, or access denied messages for unauthorized users before rendering protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart panel displaying cart items with images in enhanced cards, gradient headings, total price calculation, clear cart functionality, and checkout navigation with improved visual styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx: Shopping cart button with gradient badge showing item count, opening a sheet sidebar containing the Cart component with enhanced border styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header navigation (Products, Manage Products, Orders links), footer, and conditional rendering based on authentication and admin status. Includes branding, cart button, and login button.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that toggles between login and logout states, handles Internet Identity authentication flow, and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, blocking interaction until profile setup is complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence in local storage, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including products (get, add, update, delete), cart (get, add, clear), checkout, orders (get all, get user's, get by id), user profiles, and admin checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a modern vibrant color theme for both light and dark modes, plus typography settings using Space Grotesk and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrders.tsx: Admin page that displays all customer orders in an accordion layout, showing order details including customer address, products with images, and total price.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProducts.tsx: Admin page for managing products with CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) including image upload, form validation, and dialog-based UI for product management.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page that displays cart items and a shipping information form, validates input, and processes order placement through the checkout mutation.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page that displays order details including products, total price, and a success message after successful checkout.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Main product catalog page with a hero banner and grid layout displaying all products with add-to-cart functionality, requiring authentication to add items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended animations, custom shadows, typography settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking an e-commerce website with admin dashboard, documenting completed features for visual theme redesign, catalog updates, admin interface improvements, and checkout page updates.
